name: Blueberry Banana Pie
author: Doris Moore
instructions: Cut butter and sugar into flour. Form 2 pie shells by pressing mixture into well buttered pie pans. Bake 425Â° for 10 minutes or until light brown. Cool. Beat cream cheese until creamy, add sugar and beat well. Mix in prepared Dream Whip. Slice bananas in bottom of cooled pie shells, cover with cream cheese mixture. Top center of each pie with pie filling.
